original_text: He also built altars on the hills of Judah. He caused the people of Judah and Jerusalem to turn away from the Lord and worship false gods.
korean_text: 여호람이 또 유다 여러 산에 산당을 세워 예루살렘 주민으로 음행하게 하고 또 유다를 미혹하게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: He also built altars on the hills of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 유다의 언덕에 제단들을 쌓았다

sentences.original_text: He caused the people of Judah and Jerusalem
to turn away from the Lord
